pages.title: Spell Casting
pages.text: You can cast spells with $(l:items/1_crystal)crystals$(/l) or $(l:items/4_runestone)runes$(/l) as a medium with $(l:items/2_wand)wands$(/l).$(br2)Spell casting can be classified into $(l:mechanics/1_nature_spell#block_spell_casting)block spell casting$(/l) and $(l:mechanics/1_nature_spell#rune_spell_casting)rune spell casting$(/l).

pages.title: Block Spell casting
pages.text: When casting spells with $(l:items/1_crystal)crystals$(/l), you need to use a crystal with the $(9)corresponding element$() and cast the spell on a compatible block.$(br2)Crystals provide elemental affinity to reduce mana cost for related elements.

pages.title: Available Blocks
pages.text: $(li)$(a)Life$(): Bamboo, Cactus, Flowers, Vines, Hay Bales$(li)$(6)Earth$(): Sand, Gravel, Clay, Stone, Quartz, Stalactites, Amethyst$(li)$(c)Flame$(): Magma Blocks, Netherrack, Soul Sand$(li)$(b)Winterstorm$(): Snow, Powder Snow, Ice, Packed Ice, Blue Ice$(li)$(3)Ocean$(): Sponge, Coral Blocks

pages.title: Rune Spellcasting
pages.text: When casting spells with $(l:items/4_runestone)runes$(/l),$(br)you no longer need the presence of respective blocks.$(br2)There are 2 kinds of runes: block runes that resembles the spell when you cast crystals onto blocks, and advanced spells that can have more varieties such as charging-casting, continuous-casting, casting at target entity, or toward facing direction.

pages.title: Damage Types
pages.text: Damage from spells can have multiple categorization based on their elements and forms.$(li)$(a)Life$(): Spell, Life Spell, Magic$(li)$(6)Earth$(): Spell, Earth Spell, Projectile, Explosion, Falling Block$(li)$(c)Flame$(): Spell, Flame Spell, Magic, Fire, Explosion$(li)$(b)Winterstorm$(): Spell, Frost Spell, Projectile, Freezing$(li)$(3)Ocean$(): Spells, Ocean Spell, Magic$(li)$(3)Thunder$(): Spell, Thunder Spell, Lightning
